content.title: Intro
content.content: -mo is a masculine agentive suffix in Quenya.[1]

content.title: Examples
content.content:
Isilmo = "Man of the Moon"[2]
Ulmo = "He who pours"[1]
Ciryamo = "Mariner"[3]
Elentirmo = "Star Watcher"[4]

content.title: References
content.content:
